name: The Highlander Bar
description: The Highlander Bar at Harrah's Lake Tahoe is located on the 18th floor alongside the Forest Buffet, offering panoramic views of Lake Tahoe and the surrounding Sierra Nevada mountains. The bar features video poker, specialty cocktails, and late-night dining with traditional breakfast served from 11 PM to 6 AM. It's the perfect spot to enjoy a drink while taking in the stunning scenery from one of the highest vantage points in Stateline.
shortDescription: 18th-floor bar with panoramic Lake Tahoe views, video poker, and late-night dining.

faqs.question: Is The Highlander a sports bar?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's Harvey's signature sports bar with multiple screens showing all major sporting events.

faqs.question: Is it inside the casino?
faqs.answer: Yes, located on the casino floor at Harvey's Lake Tahoe in Stateline.

faqs.question: Good for golf groups?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The lively atmosphere, cold beers, and big screens make it perfect for unwinding after a round.

meta.title: The Highlander Bar at Harvey's Tahoe – Sports Bar | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Watch the game and enjoy craft beers at The Highlander Bar in Harvey's Lake Tahoe. The perfect sports bar for golf groups.

testimonials.quote: The Highlander Bar has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside harveys-lake-tahoe. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Sandy P.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at The Highlander Bar are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Bill F.
